revision.text:
'''{{class|Actor}}'''
{{c|native void '''Thrust'''(double ''speed'' }}={{c| 1e37, double ''angle'' }}={{c| 1e37)}}
==Usage== Adds to the actor's XY velocity based on the provided speed and angle.
If there's a need to ''set'' velocity without saving the current one, see [[VelFromAngle]].
=== Parameters === *{{c|double '''speed'''}} :The speed value to be added to the actor's current velocity. Default is 1e37 which tells GZDoom to use the Actor's {{property|Speed}} property. *{{c|double '''angle'''}} :The direction of the added velocity. Default is 1e37 which tells GZDoom to use the Actor's current angle.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
==See also== *[[VelFromAngle]] *[[Vel3DFromAngle]]
[[Category:ZScript]]
